text: "Save Your Tears" is a song by Canadian recording artist The Weeknd, from his seventh studio album, After Hours (2020). It was written by The Weeknd with Max Martin, Oscar Holter, DaHeala, and Belly, with the first four serving as the song's producers. The music video for the song was released on January 5, 2021, and depicts Tesfaye onstage with an exaggerated look that resembles plastic surgery, while wearing his signature sequined red suit. A remix of the song featuring American entertainer Ariana Grande was released on April 23, 2021. Grande is a credited songwriter on the remix of the song. After the song peaked at number four on the US Billboard Hot 100, the song topped the chart dated May 8, 2021, with both The Weeknd & Ariana Grande as credited artists.
